issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
Trying to run a script to load images
{code}
bash <(curl -Ls eucalyptus.com/install-emis)
{code}
that I found here
{code}
http://emis.eucalyptus.com/
{code}
returns
{code}
Unable to find qemu-img binary.
Would you like to install qemu-img now? (Y/n) 
{code}

When I type "Y", I get the following output.
{code}
[root@g-05-10 ~]# bash <(curl -Ls eucalyptus.com/install-emis)
Unable to find qemu-img binary.
Would you like to install qemu-img now? (Y/n) Y
